Description:
Required Skills to be Successful:Either a diploma or degree in Mechanical Engineering
Good technical knowledge of Construction Equipment
Hands on experience in terms of machine operations & application.
Knowledge of electrical, control & instrumentation systems, diesel engines & electrical motors (variable and fixed speed)
Good diagnostic capability and PC skills What equips you for the role:Minimum 1 year experience 
Good communication and interpersonal skills 
Ability to problem solve 
Technical acumen with the ability to learn new products technical changes Job Details
